entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: Advanced Comprehension Therapy
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$24.99 ‚Üí $19.99 [$19.99 ~ $24.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$19.99

Application Description

Train your brain to listen carefully with this professional speech therapy app. Three activities help you to understand sentences, follow directions, and improve language processing. If you‚Äôre looking for a speech therapy app for adults and older children with communication and cognitive impairments that takes understanding beyond single words, this app is for you. ** Try for FREE by downloading Advanced Language Therapy Lite ** Advanced Comprehension Therapy will help you find where comprehension breaks down, then help you build it back up with 3 classic speech therapy activities targeting sentence-level listening and reading comprehension. 1) IDENTIFY the picture that matches the sentence, increasing in syntactic complexity. Start by finding the picture that matches a sentence like ‚ÄúThe baby sleeps.‚Äù Work up to finding ‚ÄúThe grandparent is told a secret by the child‚Äù from closely related pictures. * 11 levels of difficulty for understanding sentences with nearly 700 unique trials * Listen, Read, & Both modes to focus on auditory, reading, or total comprehension * Includes up to 3 nouns, indirect objects, reversible sentences, & passives 2) BUILD a sentence by focusing on each word & how they all fit together. Arrange the words one-by-one to match the pictured sentence you hear. Start with 3 words and work up to 9. * 20 sentence types in nearly 1200 unique trials * Add up to 3 extra words for an added challenge * Tricky "little words" like articles, pronouns, and prepositions * Hear each word as you touch it 3) FOLLOW directions of increasing difficulty in 1-, 2-, & 3-step commands. Start with exercises like ‚ÄúTouch the pencil.‚Äù Work up to brain-bending challenges like ‚ÄúBefore you touch the large yellow striped circle, touch the small blue solid star.‚Äù * 16 levels of difficulty for following directions * Listen, Read, & Both modes to focus on auditory, reading, or total comprehension * Includes basic, temporal, & conditional commands in a hierarchy of 1-, 2-, & 3-step directions In All Activities: * Enjoy 1000‚Äôs of unique stimuli with hundreds of photos * Use hints when you get stuck so you always finish successfully * Track progress with detailed e-mail reports * Record yourself on-screen and send it when you‚Äôre finished * Repeat audio at any time, or repeat slowly for easier understanding * Designed with adults in mind but easy enough for children to use * No subscriptions, no monthly bills, no Wi-Fi needed ------------------------------------------------- Who is Advanced Comprehension Therapy For? * Speech-Language Pathologists * Adults with Aphasia (mild-moderate) * Stroke & TBI Survivors * Children with Autism or Language Learning Difficulties * Anyone who has mastered the single words in Comprehension Therapy or Language 4-in-1 & wants to take their therapy to the next level! ------------------------------------------------- Which Skills Does This App Target? * Auditory Comprehension (listening) * Reading Comprehension * Attention to Detail * Working Memory (holding information) * Nouns & Pronouns (he/she/it/they) * Adjectives (colors, size, shading) * Syntactic Processing (understanding grammar) * Temporal Concepts (before/after) * Conditional Directions (if/then) * Problem Solving (using hint/repeat or fixing errors) ------------------------------------------------- Download now to get started ‚Äì or try it for FREE with Advanced Language Therapy Lite! Looking for something different in a speech therapy app? We offer a wide range to choose from. Find the right one for you at tactustherapy.com/find

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Pro Camera by Moment
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$8.99 ‚Üí $4.99 [$4.99 ~ $8.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$4.99

In-App Purchases

  • Pro Bundle - Limited DiscountÔºö$3.99
  • Pro BundleÔºö$4.99
  • Slow ShutterÔºö$3.99
  • Time-lapseÔºö$3.99
  • Unlock Time-lapse - LimitedÔºö$2.99
  • Unlock Slow Shutter - LimitedÔºö$2.99

Application Description

Pro Camera by Moment is the manual camera app that gives you full creative control and professional-level performance, all at an affordable price. It brings us closer to what we love about our DSLR and mirrorless cameras ‚Äì exposure controls, precise focus, rich colors, smooth video, crisp audio ‚Äì without being complicated. If you are looking for a powerful and easy-to-use camera app, Pro Camera is for you. We make it fast and intuitive to switch between modes, dial in your shot, and keep shooting. Plus, we give you all the manual controls you‚Äôll need: shutter speed, ISO, white balance, focus, and more. Your favorite settings can be saved and recalled on demand. For filmmakers ‚Äì the features you need, not the ones you don‚Äôt. LUTs, color spaces, bitrates, dual-channel audio meters, real-time waveforms, fast access to frame rates, and more. For photographers ‚Äì easier than shooting on your DSLR. Shoot in RAW (even in bursts), capture brackets, and more. You can even create stunning timelapses and light trail effects (in-app purchase required). For everyone else ‚Äì inspired by the pros we made the interface simple, fast, and easy to use. We provide getting started tips, video tutorials, and full-time customer service to get you set up. We love hearing from you. If you have any features, ideas, or feedback please email us at hello@shopmoment.com or DM us on Instagram @moment. GENERAL FEATURES + Full manual: control shutter speed, iso, exposure, focus, and white balance with easy-to-use sliders + Focus peaking: manually dial in your focus using highlighted in-focus regions + Zebra stripes: quickly determine over- and under-exposed areas in the viewfinder + Split focus and exposure: take control of tricky lighting scenarios + Viewfinder grid: choose from thirds, square, and golden ratio + Gyroscope: ensure your shot is level with an on-screen gyroscope and haptic feedback PHOTOGRAPHY FEATURES + RAW and TIFF: shoot photos in RAW/ProRAW format for better editing, or TIFF for high-quality printing + RAW+JPG option: simultaneously get the best of both worlds + Burst mode: capture burst shots in RAW format ‚Äì capture action while maintaining the uncompressed quality pros want with RAW + Bracketing: capture multiple exposures to stack later in your favorite editing apps FILMMAKER FEATURES + Import, organize, and use your favorite LUTs + Color spaces: choose between Rec.709, Rec.2020 HDR, Display P3, and Apple Log (on compatible devices) + Codecs: shoot in HEVC, H.264, or any of the 422 ProRes variants + Video bitrates: get precise control over video quality with standard, medium, and high bitrate options + RGB histogram: dial in your video color, balance, and exposure + Waveform monitor: evaluate video brightness and exposure across your shot in real time + Audio meters: get just the right sound levels with real-time, precise, dual-channel audio levels + HDMI clean feed output: preview on a bigger screen + Video stabilization: make your videos buttery smooth + Video formats: change your resolution and frame rate on screen, without digging into a settings menu + Anamorphic: use the Moment Anamorphic lens to shoot amazing, letterbox style photos and videos, with a de-squeeze option built in PREMIUM FEATURES (In-App Purchases) + Timelapse mode: capture stunning time-lapse videos + Slow Shutter mode: long exposure shots with motion blur or light trails WORKS WITH + iPhone 16 Camera Control: get quick access to manual settings + Lens control: manually control which of the triple/dual lenses you want to shoot with so you can use Moment lenses over each one + Moment lenses: access options like anamorphic de-squeeze and distortion correction + Moment battery case: works with the DSLR-like shutter button on our photography cases for half-press and full-press capture. Take better photos, faster. + Apple Watch: use your watch as a remote to shoot photos or record videos + Siri Shortcuts: quick access to capture a photo or start a video

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: SessionBand Jazz Fusion
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$7.99 ‚Üí $2.99 [$2.99 ~ $7.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$2.99

Application Description

SessionBand Jazz Fusion ‚Äì Tom Cawley Special Synth & Vintage Keys Edition Create studio-quality Jazz Fusion tracks to your own chords in minutes with this special artist edition of the award-winning SessionBand app - the world‚Äôs only chord-based loop app. With over 20,000 precision-cut, chord-based loops across 15 diverse Jazz Fusion styles included, the app instantly converts the chords you select into great-sounding audio - wherever you are and whatever your ability. Perfect for songwriters and producers and the ultimate play-along for jazz rock and pop instrumentalists. Highly acclaimed, multi award-winning pianist Tom Cawley is one of the most sought-after keyboard players in the world both as a jazz pianist (Dave Weckl, Jack DeJohnette, Charlie Watts, Jamie Cullum, Guy Barker...), and as a leading pop/rock keyboardist, recording and performing around the world with U2, Peter Gabriel, Andrea Bocelli, Amy Winehouse and many others. For this special Jazz Fusion edition, Tom is joined by 2 of the world's top session musicians: Simon Lea ‚Äì Drums (Rod Stewart, Dionne Warwick, James Blunt, James Morrison, Katie Melua...) and Geoff Gascoyne ‚Äì Bass (Sting, Van Morrison, Georgie Fame...). Tom's passion for jazz and for modern and vintage keys is reflected in the diverse range of styles in this edition. And Tom has employed many of the best keyboards from his vast personal collection: from the Oberheim OB-6, Prophet 12 and Moog Model D (as well as a modular set-up), to his vintage Fender Rhodes, Wurlitzer and Hohner Pianet - they all feature in the content of this app. And to do full justice to this genre, we have increased the number of chord variations to 15 for every root note in all 15 styles! Alongside pro features like automated mixing, auto-transpose, one-touch live recording and a range of export functions, there are new tech features and upgrades like channel FX, instant PDF chord sheets and 'Track Builder' to make your track creation quicker and easier. Create professional Jazz Fusion to your own choice of chords in minutes. Everything you need to create and share thousands of stunning royalty-free tracks. Hear the results. Watch the video at sessionbandapp.com The fastest way to create your own studio-quality music: ‚Ä¢ Pick one of 15 Jazz Fusion styles ‚Ä¢ Choose your chords ‚Ä¢ Stretch or shorten loops ‚Ä¢ Build up your track in minutes ‚Ä¢ Instantly hear your track across different styles and tempos ‚Ä¢ Auto-transpose your entire track ‚Ä¢ Add FX ‚Ä¢ Mix your track ‚Ä¢ Adjust track tempo ‚Ä¢ Record direct to audio ‚Ä¢ Copy straight to other music apps ‚Ä¢ Share with the world! The ultimate mobile jam/practice tool for musicians: ‚Ä¢ Practice with your own world-class band ‚Ä¢ Loop markers let you focus on specific sections ‚Ä¢ Mute instrument channels as you like ‚Ä¢ Produce PDF chord sheets for the tracks you create...instantly ‚Ä¢ 'Flip' your track across other styles and tempos ‚Ä¢ Transpose your whole track instantly You don't have to be a musician to create seriously good music and release it royalty-free! ‚Ä¢ Simple, intuitive interface ‚Ä¢ Audition the loop you are about to insert ‚Ä¢ ‚ÄòTrack Builder‚Äô allows simple creation of a full track ‚Ä¢ Intuitive mixing and record functions Detailed Product Information: ‚Ä¢ 15 diverse Jazz Fusion styles: Acoustic Rock; 70s Funk; Pop Rock; Neo Soul; Psychedelic Soul; 70s Soul; Jazz Rock; Disco Funk; Neo Classical; Latin Fusion; Indie Pop; Electro Pop; Electro Jazz; DnB; Groovy Six Four ‚Ä¢ Tempos from 60bpm to 200bpm ‚Ä¢ 15 chord variations for every root note: maj; maj7; maj7(#11); 11; 7; 7(b9); 7(#9,#5); 7(#11); min; m(#5); m7(9); m(maj7); m7(b5); dim; maj ‚Äòstop‚Äô ‚Ä¢ 20 alternative drum grooves/drum fills in every style in addition to the main drum groove ‚Ä¢ The musical content in this app cannot be found in any of the other SessionBand apps ‚Ä¢ All loops are offered royalty-free and can be used freely in your own works

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: SessionBand Jazz 4
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$4.99 ‚Üí $2.99 [$2.99 ~ $4.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$2.99

Application Description

Create professional quality jazz tracks to your own chords in minutes with this brand new edition of the award-winning SessionBand jazz app featuring exclusive, royalty-free, chord-based loops performed by 4 of the world's top jazz musicians: Jason Rebello (Piano); Jeremy Stacey (Drums); Patrick Clahar (Sax) and Geoff Gascoyne (Bass). Volume 4 is the ultimate jazz play-along and the perfect tool for jazz songwriters. And we have added loads of extra features and tech improvements since Volumes 1, 2 and 3. Here's what you get: 1. 15 chord variations per root note! From straight major and minors right through to the most exotic jazz chords 2. 20 alternative drum grooves/fills in each style 3. Free access to over 150 downloadable jazz standards ready to play along to in any key! 4. Instant PDF chord sheets for the tracks you create 5. New tech enhancements like 'Track Builder' to make the workflow even faster. With over 15,000 precision-cut, chord-based loops included in the download, the app instantly converts the chords you select into great sounding, royalty-free audio - wherever you are and whatever your ability. For this long-awaited edition, we have gone back to mostly classic jazz with a couple of contemporary styles. Among the classics, expect to hear medium, post-bop Wayne Shorter swing styles in four and three, plus Wes Montgomery and Ahmad Jamal-inspired up-tempo swing styles. There's a contemporary Brad Mehldau-type piano and string style in 5/4 and a wonderful carnival-like worldbeat Cuban number with many rich, melodic tenor sax loops to choose from. Create professional jazz tracks to your own choice of chords in minutes. Everything you need to create, share and publish thousands of stunning royalty-free jazz tracks. Hear the results. Watch the video at www.sessionbandapp.com The fastest way to create your own studio-quality jazz: ‚Ä¢ Pick one of 8 jazz styles ‚Ä¢ Choose your chords ‚Ä¢ Stretch or shorten loops ‚Ä¢ Build up your track in minutes ‚Ä¢ Instantly hear your track across different styles and tempos ‚Ä¢ Auto-transpose your entire track ‚Ä¢ Add FX ‚Ä¢ Mix ‚Ä¢ Change tempo ‚Ä¢ Record direct to audio ‚Ä¢ Copy straight to other music apps ‚Ä¢ Share with the world! The ultimate mobile jam/practice tool for musicians: ‚Ä¢ Practice with your own world-class quartet ‚Ä¢ Loop markers let you focus on specific sections ‚Ä¢ Mute instrument channels as you like ‚Ä¢ Produce PDF chord sheets for the tracks you create...instantly ‚Ä¢ 'Flip' your track across other styles and tempos ‚Ä¢ Transpose your whole track instantly ‚Ä¢ Download backing tracks for over 150 jazz standards for free (with chord sheets) ready to play. Transpose them with just one touch! Get some of the world's best jazz musicians playing on your tracks: ‚Ä¢ Jason Rebello (Piano): Sting; Jeff Beck; Wayne Shorter; Peter Gabriel... ‚Ä¢ Jeremy Stacey (Drums): Noel Gallagher's High Flying Birds; King Crimson; Amy Winehouse; Take That; Eric Clapton... ‚Ä¢ Patrick Clahar (Sax); Bill Bruford's Earthworks; Incognito; Stevie Wonder; James Brown... ‚Ä¢ Geoff Gascoyne (Bass); Sting; Van Morrison; Guy Barker; Georgie Fame... You don't have to be a musician to create seriously good music and release it royalty-free! ‚Ä¢ Simple, intuitive interface ‚Ä¢ Audition the loop you are about to insert ‚Ä¢ ‚ÄòTrack Builder‚Äô allows simple creation of a full track ‚Ä¢ Intuitive mixing and record functions Detailed Product Information: ‚Ä¢ 8 classic and contemporary jazz styles: Elvin Swing; McCoy Three; Mozambique; Sting Swing; Latin Strings; Classical Five; Swing Bass; Up Swing Strings ‚Ä¢ Tempos from 107bpm to 190bpm ‚Ä¢ 15 chord variations for every root note: maj; maj7; maj7(#11); 11; 7; 7(b9); 7(#9,#5); 7(#11); min; m(#5); m7(9); m(maj7); m7(b5); dim; maj ‚Äòstop‚Äô ‚Ä¢ 20 alternative drum grooves/drum fills in every style in addition to the main drum groove ‚Ä¢ The musical content in this app cannot be found in any of the other SessionBand apps ‚Ä¢ All loops are offered royalty-free and can be used freely in your own works

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: SessionBand Soul Jazz Funk 3
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$4.99 ‚Üí $2.99 [$2.99 ~ $4.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$2.99

Application Description

Create studio-quality soul, jazz and funk tracks to your own chords in minutes with the latest edition of the award-winning SessionBand app ‚Äì the world‚Äôs only chord-based loop app. Featuring exclusive royalty-free, chord-based loops performed by 4 of the world's top jazz musicians: Jason Rebello (Keyboards); Jeremy Stacey (Drums); Patrick Clahar (Sax) and Geoff Gascoyne (Bass). Volume 3 is the ultimate soul jazz funk play-along and the perfect tool for songwriters. Here's what you get: ‚Ä¢ 15 chord variations per root note in every style! From straight major and minors right through to the most exotic soul jazz chords ‚Ä¢ 20 alternative drum grooves/fills in each style ‚Ä¢ Instant PDF chord sheets for the tracks you create ‚Ä¢ New tech enhancements like ‚ÄòTrack Builder‚Äô to make the workflow even faster With over 15,000 precision-cut, chord-based loops included in the download, the app instantly converts the chords you select into great-sounding, royalty-free audio - wherever you are and whatever your ability. This latest edition contains a diverse spread of 8 soul jazz funk styles from a Herbie Hancock slow burn, laid-back 70's funk groove all the way through to an exciting, uptempo neo-latin jazz rock groove in 7/4. You can check out samples of all the styles at www.sessionbandapp.com/sessionband-soul-jazz-funk-3-music-app-create-backing-tracks/ SessionBand Soul Jazz Funk 3 is a professional app ‚Äì essential for anyone learning jazz music and perfect for soul jazz funk musicians looking for the ultimate play-along. But equally, it‚Äôs simple enough for non-musicians who love music to create their own great sounding, copyright-free soul jazz funk music and share it with the world ‚Äì even if they don‚Äôt play a note! Create professional soul jazz funk tracks to your own choice of chords in minutes. Everything you need to create, share and publish thousands of stunning royalty-free tracks. The fastest way to create your own studio-quality tracks: ‚Ä¢ Pick one of 8 soul jazz funk styles ‚Ä¢ Choose your chords ‚Ä¢ Stretch or shorten loops ‚Ä¢ Build up your track in minutes ‚Ä¢ Instantly hear your track across different styles and tempos ‚Ä¢ Auto-transpose your entire track ‚Ä¢ Add FX ‚Ä¢ Mix ‚Ä¢ Change tempo ‚Ä¢ Record direct to audio ‚Ä¢ Copy straight to other music apps ‚Ä¢ Share with the world! The ultimate mobile jam/practice tool for musicians: ‚Ä¢ Practice with your own world-class band ‚Ä¢ Loop markers let you focus on specific sections ‚Ä¢ Mute instrument channels as you like ‚Ä¢ Produce PDF chord sheets for the tracks you create‚Ä¶instantly ‚Ä¢ ‚ÄòFlip‚Äô your track across other styles and tempos ‚Ä¢ Transpose your whole track instantly Get the world‚Äôs best musicians playing on your tracks: ‚Ä¢ Jason Rebello (Keyboards): Sting; Jeff Beck; Wayne Shorter; Peter Gabriel‚Ä¶ ‚Ä¢ Jeremy Stacey (Drums): Noel Gallagher‚Äôs High Flying Birds; King Crimson; Amy Winehouse; Take That; Eric Clapton‚Ä¶ ‚Ä¢ Patrick Clahar (Sax); Bill Bruford‚Äôs Earthworks; Incognito; Stevie Wonder; James Brown‚Ä¶ ‚Ä¢ Geoff Gascoyne (Bass); Sting; Van Morrison; Guy Barker; Georgie Fame‚Ä¶ You don‚Äôt have to be a musician to create seriously good music and release it royalty-free! ‚Ä¢ Simple, intuitive interface ‚Ä¢ Audition the loop you are about to insert ‚Ä¢ ‚ÄòTrack Builder‚Äô allows simple creation of a full track ‚Ä¢ Intuitive mixing and record functions Detailed Product Info: ‚Ä¢ 4,320 chord-based multi channel loop stacks (Over 15,000 individual loops) ‚Ä¢ 8 diverse soul jazz funk styles: Laid-Back Funk; 70‚Äôs Funk; Swing Beat; Rare Groove; Latin Groove; Broken Beat; Jazz Rock; Groove In Seven ‚Ä¢ Tempos from 60bpm to 220bpm ‚Ä¢ 15 chord variations for every root note: maj; maj7; maj7(#11); 11; 7; 7(b9); 7(#9,#5); 7(#11); min; m(#5); m7(9); m(maj7); m7(b5); dim; maj ‚Äòstop‚Äô ‚Ä¢ 20 alternative drum grooves/drum fills in every style in addition to the main drum groove The musical content in this app cannot be found in any of the other SessionBand apps. All loops are offered royalty-free and can be used freely in your own works.

entry.title: Pasha Planet: Reborn
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$3.99 ‚Üí $1.99 [$0.99 ~ $3.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$1.99

Application Description

‚ÄúPasha Planet: Reborn‚Äù is the debut game of Scorpio Game, a Taiwanese independent game development studio. Prepare to be charmed by unique hand-painted scenes and have fun with light detective work, players will get to explore the main game plot that revolves around the characters‚Äô daily life through an immersive and one-of-a-kind puzzle-solving gameplay. [Game Overview] The story takes place on the distant planet of Pasha. A prosperous underground city, which are inhabited by adorable doggies, can be found there. They live in peace day after day, enjoying the convenience brought about by technology. However, the protagonist Bobbie, who grew up in the city, often fantasizes about getting out of the closed-off Underground City to see the world outside. This is where the main story line of the game begins. Players will take on the role of Bobbie and explore the seemingly calm and peaceful city, which is in actual fact, facing an energy crisis. Players must clear stages of challenges to solve the final mystery and figure out a way to save all the inhabitants before disaster strikes! [Game Features] - Created by an independent game development studio in Taiwan. - Classic click-and-point puzzle-solving gameplay. - Charming and heartwarming hand-painted scenes. - Challenging puzzles and stages.

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$3.99

Application Description

You wake up, alone, on a strange island full of puzzles that will challenge and surprise you. You don't remember who you are, and you don't remember how you got here, but there's one thing you can do: explore the island in hope of discovering clues, regaining your memory, and somehow finding your way home. The Witness is a single-player game in an open world with dozens of locations to explore and over 500 puzzles. This game respects you as an intelligent player and it treats your time as precious. There's no filler; each of those puzzles brings its own new idea into the mix. So, this is a game full of ideas.

Application Description

In this eagerly anticipated sequel of the game ‚ÄúClouds & Sheep‚Äù, the cute sheep are finally on the loose again! Solve countless quests and fulfill your wooly friends‚Äô needs. Plant grass, flowers, trees and shear your animals‚Äô different-colored wool to stock up your resources! Collect happy stars, harvest wood and flower petals and use them to provide your flock with food, accessories, toys and more! Control the clouds and make it rain to ensure your sheep never run out of fresh water to drink. If your sheep feel happy and content, they‚Äôll bring tiny lambs into the world! Every single animal is asking for your attention! The fluffy balls of wool love to be entertained. Make your sheep jump and use different toys like the trampoline, the seesaw and the swing to actively play with them! Watch your pets interact with each other and observe their reactions to the objects you give to them! Customize your flock‚Äôs pasture with fun objects and choose between different settings like the Wild West or Pirate scenery. Watch your flock run around by day and sleep by the cozy campfire at night. Do everything you can to keep your sheep happy and healthy to prevent them from becoming big, cottony clouds in the sky. Features: - PLAY WITHOUT ADS! - Awesome sequel of the top game ‚ÄúClouds & Sheep‚Äù - Go on an epic adventure to find the legendary Fountain of Youth! - Simulation game with adorable sheep - Take care of your flock - Raise sweet little lambs - Actively play with your animals - Give them many different items and objects - Grow and harvest various resources - Shear your sheep - Customize their pasture - Control the weather - Day-night cycle - Open-ended game set in a 3D world - Suitable for kids, but also fun for the whole family - MFi game controller support - Game Center support Thank you for playing ‚ÄòClouds & Sheep 2‚Äô! Application Description

Burn rubber and shred metal in the ultimate driving playground! Wreckfest is jam-packed with upgrade and customization options. Whether you are preparing for your next demolition derby with reinforced bumpers, roll cages, side protectors and much more, or setting your car up for a banger race with engine performance parts like air filters, camshafts, fuel systems, etc., Wreckfest is shaping up to be the best combative motorsport game out there. ‚Ä¢ Unique Racing Experience ‚Äì Exhilarating no-rules racing action with defining, once-in-a-lifetime moments that can be achieved only with a true-to-life physics simulation. Witness insane neck-to-neck fighting on high-speed circuits, face total destruction madness on crazy courses with intersections and oncoming traffic, or go for demolition dominance in derby arenas. ‚Ä¢ Awesome Cars ‚Äì Our cars are old, banged up, patched together... They ooze style and character! From old American heavy-hitters to agile Europeans and fun Asians, you won‚Äôt find anything like this in other games. ‚Ä¢ Meaningful Customization ‚Äì Change not only the look of your cars but also upgrade their body armor ‚Äì Reinforce them with heavy iron that protects you from damage, but also adds weight, which impacts the cars handling. Modify your car to make a robust tank or a fragile but lightning-fast rocket, or anything in between! ‚Ä¢ Multiplayer ‚Äì Wreck your friends in local multiplayer and take racing to the limit while chasing for demolition dominance! ‚Ä¢ Challenge modes ‚Äì Have hilarious fun with crop harvesters, lawn mowers, school buses, three-wheelers and much more! ‚Ä¢ Career Mode ‚Äì Battle for championships, earn experience, unlock new upgrades and cars, and become the all-time Wreckfest champion! ¬© www.handy-games.com GmbH

Application Description

Immerse yourself in the world of Dune. Experience the ultimate blend of strategy and intrigue as you navigate the treacherous landscapes of Arrakis in the award-winning board game Dune: Imperium! Battle online, locally with AI, or against the formidable House Hagal. Earn Achievements that showcase your prowess as a leader. Embark on more than a dozen Challenges that will test your wit and cunning. Compete for badges in the rotating Skirmish Mode where no two games are the same! Control the Spice. Control the Universe. Arrakis. Dune. Desert Planet. Raise your banner above the vast wasteland before you. As the Great Houses of the Landsraad marshal their forces and their spies, whom will you influence, and whom will you betray? A tyrannical Emperor. The secretive Bene Gesserit. The shrewd Spacing Guild. The ferocious Fremen of the Deep Desert. The power of the Imperium can be yours, but war is not the only way to claim it. Dune: Imperium blends deck-building and worker placement in a deeply thematic new strategy game where the fate of the Empire hangs on your decisions. Will you seek political allies or rely upon military might? Economic strength or subtle intrigues? A council seat‚Ä¶ or a sharpened blade? The cards are dealt. The choice is yours. The Imperium awaits.

Application Description

Halls of Torment is a horde survival game with a pre-rendered retro look reminiscent of RPGs from the late 90s. Choose one of many hero characters and descend into the deadly Halls of Torment. Fight unholy horrors from beyond and survive wave after wave of enemies until you face one of the tormented Lords. Strengthen your hero with character traits, abilities, and items. Create a new powerful build during each run. Explore various underground expanses and find new powerful items that enable you to venture even deeper into the abyss. First available on Steam, the 90's-style RPG survival roguelike, Halls of Torment, is now making its debut on mobile! „ÄêFeatures„Äë ‚óÜ Quick and casual 30 minute runs ‚óÜ Old school pre-rendered art style ‚óÜ Quest-based meta progression ‚óÜ Large selection of diverse abilities, traits, and items, all enabling you to create interesting synergies ‚óÜ Diverse bosses featuring unique mechanics and attack patterns ‚óÜ Several distinct characters allowing for many different play styles ‚óÜ Unlock and explore multiple interesting and challenging underground worlds ‚óÜ Unique items can be sent up to the overworld and used to customize future runs ‚óÜ Craft magical tinctures to direct fate in your favor ‚óÜ Unlock the power of each class and combine them with your chosen character ‚óÜ Find rare item variants to further improve your builds „ÄêFull Content List„Äë ‚óÜ6 stages with unique environments ‚óÜ11 playable characters & character marks ‚óÜ25 blessings that make you stronger for each run ‚óÜ68 unique items to retrieve and unlock ‚óÜ240 higher rarity item variants ‚óÜ74 abilities and ability upgrades ‚óÜ36 artifacts to customize your game experience ‚óÜ35+ unique bosses ‚óÜ70+ unique monsters ‚óÜ500 quests to complete ‚óÜ1000+ traits that upgrade characters and abilities Our content list is still growing, expect more in the future! „ÄêContact Us„Äë Discord: @Erabit or join via https://discord.gg/Gkje2gzCqB Email: prglobal@erabitstudios.com

  • Hirelings & LandmarksÔºö$9.99

Application Description

Play the digital adaptation of the beloved tabletop board game. Root is a game of adventure and war where 2 to 4 players battle for control of a vast wilderness. The nefarious Marquise de Cat has seized the great woodland, intent on harvesting its riches. Under her rule, the many creatures of the forest have banded together. This Alliance will seek to strengthen its resources and subvert the rule of Cats. In this effort, the Alliance may enlist the help of the wandering Vagabonds who are able to move through the more dangerous woodland paths. Though some may sympathize with the Alliance‚Äôs hopes and dreams, these wanderers are old enough to remember the great birds of prey who once controlled the woods. Meanwhile, at the edge of the region, the proud, squabbling Eyrie have found a new commander who they hope will lead their faction to resume their ancient birthright. The stage is set for a contest that will decide the fate of the great woodland. It is up to the players to decide which group will ultimately take root.

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$4.99

Application Description

This eye-care extension enables night mode by creating dark themes for websites on the fly. Dark Reader inverts bright colors, making web pages high contrast and easier to read at night. It perfectly suits system dark mode. The app includes multiple beautiful color themes. Choose between dark mode, colored, dimmed and screen shader themes, or create your own by tuning background and text colors. Enable or disable the extension for specific websites, auto-toggle based on system dark mode preferences, or activate dark theme detection to leave already dark websites untouched. Dark Reader's algorithms have been developed since 2014 by experts in the web development industry and evolve alongside modern web technologies to deliver fast and reliable dark mode support. Dark Reader doesn't show ads and doesn't collect any data. Before you install, disable similar extensions. Activate Dark Reader in Safari preferences. Enjoy browsing!
